SELECT a.uuid AS uuid_key, CASE WHEN aNode.uuid IS NULL THEN a.uuid ELSE aNode.uuid END AS endorsing_node_key, ar.has_accepted AS endorsement_approved, a.ws_password AS password, a.name AS title, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(a.description))<10 THEN null ELSE a.description END AS description, CASE WHEN a.language IS NULL THEN 'en' WHEN char_length(trim(a.language))<2 THEN 'en' ELSE a.language END AS language, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(a.email))<5 THEN null ELSE a.email END AS email, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(a.phone))<5 THEN null ELSE a.phone END AS phone, trim(replace(a.homepage, ' ', '%20')) AS homepage, trim(replace(a.logoURL, ' ', '%20')) as logo_url, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(a.address))<1 THEN null ELSE a.address END AS address, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(a.city))<1 THEN null ELSE a.city END AS city, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(a.iso_country_code))<2 THEN null ELSE upper(a.iso_country_code) END AS country, CASE WHEN char_length(trim(a.zip))<1 THEN null ELSE a.zip END AS postal_code, COALESCE(a.created, a.modified, now()) AS created, COALESCE(a.modified, a.created, now()) AS modified, a.deleted FROM agent a JOIN agent_relation ar ON a.id=ar.to_agent_id JOIN agent aNode ON aNode.id=ar.from_agent_id WHERE a.type=14010 AND ar.deleted IS NULL AND a.name NOT IN('Name', 'UPDATE', 'UPDATED NAME', 'Test Name', 'IPT Test Organisation','GBIF Prod Reg Test1', 'GBIF Production Registry Test','GBIF Production Registry Test','TestNewOrganization','Thematic Networks','US GBIF mirror')
INSERT INTO organization(key,endorsing_node_key,endorsement_approved,password, title,description,language,email,phone,homepage,logo_url,address,city,country,postal_code, created,modified,deleted,created_by,modified_by) VALUES(?uuid_key::uuid,?endorsing_node_key::uuid,?endorsement_approved::boolean,?password, ?title,?description,UPPER(?language),?email,?phone,?homepage,?logo_url,?address,?city,upper(?country),?postal_code, ?created,?modified,?deleted,?{"ADMIN"}, ?{"ADMIN"});
